TANGO EN FLOR
spring festivalito
May 10-12, 2024
Podgorica, Montenegro
Register
Venue
Located in the vibrant heart of the city, the iconic Hard Rock Cafe Podgorica is celebrated for its legendary cuisine, delightful drinks, and a truly authentic rock atmosphere.

Our milongas will be held in the exclusive private upper level of Hard Rock Cafe, which features an inviting dance podium equipped with a top-notch sound system, a comfortable bar area, and an outside terrace with views of the main city square. We cannot wait to see it filled with hugging couples.
Couples
Their love for tango will inspire our embraces. Their presence will make our dance floor come alive. We're thrilled to introduce these three exceptional couples, all eager to share their tango with us.
Relja Dereta y Anđela Djiki Ristić
(Serbia)
Osky Casas y Magdalena Vračarić
(Argentina/Croatia)
Emir Ljaljević y Andrea Drljević
(Montenegro)
DJs
We've carefully handpicked our musicalizadores to ensure an unending flow of irresistible golden-age melodies that will effortlessly keep you tied to the dance floor. The Hard Rock Cafe vibe is in the place!
DJ Osky Casas
(Argentina)
DJ Djiki
(Serbia)
DJ Davor Perhaj
(Croatia)
DJ Luka Radunović
(Montenegro)
DJ Boban Šćepanović
(Montenegro)
